Job Description: Job Description      1) BTech in Computer Science, EEE, ECE / MCA.   2) Excellent knowledge in Java Script, jQuery, JSON, Bootstrap.   3) Excellent hands on knowledge in React JS, Redux, Hooks and Node JS.   4) Minimum 3 plus years hands on working exp in React JS and Node JS.   5) Excellent Hands on Knowledge in Data Structure and Algorithms.   6) Good working Exp with SQL programming skills.   7) Good communication skill, proactive, willing to learn and work independently.    Optional / Nice to Have Requirements    1) Product Development Exp in Fin Tech and Payment Engineering Domain.   2) Core Java, Oops, Data Structure, Algorithms   Restful API and Microservices hands on programing knowledge.   3) Strong analytical skills and unit testing skills.         Qualifications     Any Graduate With Computer / IT / EEE
